                numDead = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","死亡次数",numDead)
        end
        numXueSe = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","血色次数")
        if numXueSe == nil then
                numXueSe = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","血色次数",numXueSe)
        end
        numEMo = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","恶魔次数")
        if numEMo == nil then
                numEMo = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","恶魔次数",numEMo)
        end
        numTieXue = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","铁血次数")
        if numTieXue == nil then
                numTieXue = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","铁血次数",numTieXue)
        end
        nowTime = os.time()
        timeZhengLi = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeZhengLi")
        if timeZhengLi == nil then
                timeZhengLi = nowTime - 10 * 60
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeZhengLi",timeZhengLi)
        end
        timeJiNeng = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeJiNeng")
        if timeJiNeng == nil then
                timeJiNeng = nowTime - 10 * 60
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeJiNeng",timeJiNeng)
        end
        timeQiangHua = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeQiangHua")
        if timeQiangHua == nil then
                timeQiangHua = nowTime - 10 * 60
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeQiangHua",timeQiangHua)
        end
        timeJiaoSe = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeJiaoSe")
        if timeJiaoSe == nil then
                timeJiaoSe = nowTime - 10 * 60
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeJiaoSe",timeJiaoSe)
        end
        timeHuoDong = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeHuoDong")
        if timeHuoDong == nil then
                timeHuoDong = nowTime - 10 * 60
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeHuoDong",timeHuoDong)
        end
        timeZhuanZhi = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeZhuanZhi")
        if timeZhuanZhi == nil then
                timeZhuanZhi = nowTime - 10 * 60
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeZhuanZhi",timeZhuanZhi)
        end
        timeZiYuan = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeZiYuan")
        if timeZiYuan == nil then
                timeZiYuan = nowTime - 10 * 60
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeZiYuan",timeZiYuan)
        end
        numXunHuan = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numXunHuan")
        if numXunHuan == nil then
                numXunHuan = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numXunHuan",numXunHuan)
        end
        numQuanShu = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numQuanShu")
        if numQuanShu == nil then
                numQuanShu = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numQuanShu",numQuanShu)
        end
        numDiaoXian = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numDiaoXian")
        if numDiaoXian == nil then
                numDiaoXian = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numDiaoXian",numDiaoXian)
        end
        numDiaoXianDengDai = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numDiaoXianDengDai")
        if numDiaoXianDengDai == nil then
                numDiaoXianDengDai = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numDiaoXianDengDai",numDiaoXianDengDai)
        end
        numJiaoSe = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","角色")
        if numJiaoSe == nil then
                numJiaoSe = 1
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","角色",numJiaoSe)
        end
        isYouHua = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","优化")
        if isYouHua == nil then
                isYouHua = false
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","优化",isYouHua)
        end
        timeHuanJiaoSe = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeHuanJiaoSe")
        if timeHuanJiaoSe == nil then
                timeHuanJiaoSe = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeHuanJiaoSe",timeHuanJiaoSe)
        end
        timeTouXiang = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeTouXiang")
        if timeTouXiang == nil then
                timeTouXiang = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeTouXiang",timeTouXiang)
        end
        timeChiBang = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeChiBang")
        if timeChiBang == nil then
                timeChiBang = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeChiBang",timeChiBang)
        end
        timeChengHao = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeChengHao")
        if timeChengHao == nil then
                timeChengHao = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeChengHao",timeChengHao)
        end
        isWeiXinWeiHu = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","微信维护")
        if isWeiXinWeiHu == nil then
                isWeiXinWeiHu = false
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","微信维护",isWeiXinWeiHu)
        end
        hourWeiXin = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","时")
        if hourWeiXin == nil then
                hourWeiXin = random(10,22)
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","时",hourWeiXin)
        end
        minWeiXin = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","分")
        if minWeiXin == nil then
                minWeiXin = random(1,50)
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","分",minWeiXin)
        end
        timeMaiLan = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeMaiLan")
        if timeMaiLan == nil then
                timeMaiLan = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeMaiLan",timeMaiLan)
        end
        numJinBi = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","金币")
        if numJinBi == nil then
                numJinBi = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","金币",numJinBi)
        end
        numFenZuan = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","粉钻")
        if numFenZuan == nil then
                numFenZuan = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","粉钻",numFenZuan)
        end
        numJiaoYi = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","交易次数")
        if numJiaoYi == nil then
                numJiaoYi = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","交易次数",numJiaoYi)
        end
        isHuanWifi = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isHuanWifi")
        if isHuanWifi == nil then
                isHuanWifi = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isHuanWifi",isHuanWifi)
        end
        numJiaoYiChaoShi = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","交易超时")
        if numJiaoYiChaoShi == nil then
                numJiaoYiChaoShi = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","交易超时",numJiaoYiChaoShi)
        end
        timeFaSongSiXin = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeFaSongSiXin")
        if timeFaSongSiXin == nil then
                timeFaSongSiXin = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeFaSongSiXin",timeFaSongSiXin)
        end
        numDay = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","第几天")
        if numDay == nil then
                numDay = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","第几天",numDay)
        end
        timeHanHua = loadPlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeHanHua")
        if timeHanHua == nil then
                timeHanHua = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeHanHua",timeHanHua)
        end
        tiaoShi("初次加载")
end
--发邮件
function faEmail( EmailNeiRong )
        local mail = require "mail";   --载入扩展库
        a = mail.send("xinqinew@163.com", "xinqinew@163.com", EmailNeiRong, EmailNeiRong, "smtp.163.com", "xinqinew@163.com", "Qwer1234")
        -- if a == true then         --发送成功
        --     dialog("Succeed!", 0)
        -- else
        --     dialog(a, 0)
        -- end
end
--脚本故障检测
function jiaoBenGuZhangJianCe( ... )
        if isJiaoBenJianCe == false then
                local tmpMin = tonumber(iphoneId) % 40 
                if nowDateTime.min >= tmpMin and nowDateTime.min <= 45 then
                        tiaoShi("脚本故障检测")
                        isJiaoBenJianCe = true
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","脚本故障检测",isJiaoBenJianCe)
                        F_SavesW(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId..".txt",nowDateTime.hour..":"..nowDateTime.min)
                        timeJiaoBenJianCe = nowDateTime.hour..":"..nowDateTime.min
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","脚本故障检测时间",timeJiaoBenJianCe)
                        -- writePlist(luaMuLu..iphoneId..".plist","等级1",APP1.dengJi)
                        -- writePlist(luaMuLu..iphoneId..".plist","等级2",APP2.dengJi)
                        for i=1,10 do
                                _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId..".txt", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/jb/")
                                if err then
                                else
                                        break
                                end
                        end
                        for i=1,10 do
                                _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."jb1.jpg", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/RMB/")
                                if err then
                                else
                                        break
                                end
                        end
                        -- if pingTai2 ~= "10" then
                        --         for i=1,10 do
                        --                 _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."jb2.jpg", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/RMB/")
                        --                 if err then
                        --                 else
                        --                         break
                        --                 end
                        --         end
                        -- end
                        -- for i=1,10 do
                        --         _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."_jinbi1.txt", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/jinbi/")
                        --         if err then
                        --         else
                        --                 break
                        --         end
                        -- end
                        -- if pingTai2 ~= "10" then
                        --         for i=1,10 do
                        --                 _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."_jinbi2.txt", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/jinbi/")
                        --                 if err then
                        --                 else
                        --                         break
                        --                 end
                        --         end
                        -- end
                        -- for i=1,10 do
                        --         _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."_yinbi1.txt", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/yinbi/")
                        --         if err then
                        --         else
                        --                 break
                        --         end
                        -- end
                        -- if pingTai2 ~= "10" then
                        --         for i=1,10 do
                        --                 _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."_yinbi2.txt", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/yinbi/")
                        --                 if err then
                        --                 else
                        --                         break
                        --                 end
                        --         end
                        -- end
                        -- for i=1,10 do
                        --         _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."_dengji1.txt", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/dengji/")
                        --         if err then
                        --         else
                        --                 break
                        --         end
                        -- end
                        -- if pingTai2 ~= "10" then
                        --         for i=1,10 do
                        --                 _, err = ftp.upload(luaPath.."/res/"..iphoneId.."_dengji2.txt", ftpMuLu..xiangMu.."/dengji/")
                        --                 if err then
                        --                 else
                        --                         break
                        --                 end
                        --         end
                        -- end
                        loadUpXinXi()
                        delFile("/User/Media/TouchSprite/res/*.*")  
                end
        end        
        if isJiaoBenJianCe == true then
                if nowDateTime.min > 45 and nowDateTime.min <= 59 then
                        tiaoShi("脚本故障检测")
                        isJiaoBenJianCe = false
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","脚本故障检测",isJiaoBenJianCe)
                end
        end
end
--读取上传信息
function loadUpXinXi( ... )
        APP1.dengJi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","等级1")
        APP1.numJinBi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","金币1")
        APP1.numYinBi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","银币1")
        APP1.numHuoYueDu = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","活跃度1")
        APP1.isBeiBaoMan = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","背包已满1")
        timeJiaoBenJianCe = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","脚本故障检测时间")
        APP1.numZiDingJia = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","自定价1")
        APP1.numFuShi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","符石1")
        APP1.numXinYongZhi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","信用值1")
        APP1.isGaoJiCangBaoTu = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","高级藏宝图1")
        APP1.isPoZhuangBei = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","破装备1")
        APP1.jiaoSeName = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","人物名字1")
        APP1.dengLuCiShu = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","登录次数1")
        APP1.isZuoJi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","坐骑1")
        APP1.numHongBao = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","红包1")
        sysver = getOSVer();
        F_SavesW("/User/Media/TouchSprite/res/"..iphoneId..".txt",timeJiaoBenJianCe.."\t"..iphoneId.."A".."\t"..APP1.fuWuQi_JianXie.."\t".."LV."..APP1.dengJi.."\t"..APP1.numJinBi.."\t"..APP1.numXinYongZhi.."\t"..APP1.numYinBi.."\t"..APP1.numHuoYueDu.."\t"..APP1.isBeiBaoMan.."\t"..APP1.numZiDingJia.."\t"..APP1.numFuShi.."\t"..APP1.isGaoJiCangBaoTu.."\t"..APP1.isPoZhuangBei.."\t"..APP1.jiaoSeName.."\t"..APP1.dengLuCiShu.."\t"..APP1.isZuoJi.."\t"..APP1.numHongBao.."\t"..sysver.."\n")
        if pingTai2 ~= "10" then
                APP2.dengJi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","等级2")
                APP2.numJinBi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","金币2")
                APP2.numYinBi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","银币2")
                APP2.numHuoYueDu = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","活跃度2")
                APP2.isBeiBaoMan = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","背包已满2")
                timeJiaoBenJianCe = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","脚本故障检测时间")
                APP2.numZiDingJia = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","自定价2")
                APP2.numFuShi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","符石2")
                APP2.numXinYongZhi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","信用值2")
                APP2.isGaoJiCangBaoTu = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","高级藏宝图2")
                APP2.isPoZhuangBei = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","破装备2")
                APP2.jiaoSeName = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","人物名字2")
                APP2.dengLuCiShu = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","登录次数2")
                APP2.isZuoJi = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","坐骑2")
                APP2.numHongBao = loadPlist("/User/Media/TouchSprite/lua/mt.plist","红包2")
                F_SavesA("/User/Media/TouchSprite/res/"..iphoneId..".txt",timeJiaoBenJianCe.."\t"..iphoneId.."B".."\t"..APP2.fuWuQi_JianXie.."\t".."LV."..APP2.dengJi.."\t"..APP2.numJinBi.."\t"..APP2.numXinYongZhi.."\t"..APP2.numYinBi.."\t"..APP2.numHuoYueDu.."\t"..APP2.isBeiBaoMan.."\t"..APP2.numZiDingJia.."\t"..APP2.numFuShi.."\t"..APP2.isGaoJiCangBaoTu.."\t"..APP1.isPoZhuangBei.."\t"..APP2.isPoZhuangBei.."\t"..APP2.dengLuCiShu.."\t"..APP2.isZuoJi.."\t"..APP2.numHongBao.."\t"..sysver.."\n")
        end
        for i=1,10 do
                _, err = ftp.upload("/User/Media/TouchSprite/res/"..iphoneId..".txt", ftpMuLu.."xinxi/")
                if err then
                else
                        break
                end
        end
end
--每日重置
function chongZhi( ... )
        if nowDateTime.day ~= nowDayNight and nowDateTime.hour >= 23 and nowDateTime.min >= 55 then
                tiaoShi("晚重置")
                nowDayNight = nowDateTime.day
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","日期晚",nowDayNight)
                numJiaoYi = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","交易次数",numJiaoYi)
                numJiaoYiChaoShi = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","交易超时",numJiaoYiChaoShi)
        end
        if numQuanShu ~= 0 then
                local tmpXuanXiang = string.find(duoXuan1,"1")
                if tmpXuanXiang ~= nil then
                        if nowDateTime.day ~= nowDay then                        
                                if nowDateTime.hour >= 8 and nowDateTime.min >= 0 then
                                        tiaoShi("8点0分重置")
                                        nowDay = nowDateTime.day
                                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","日期",nowDay)

                                        -- today = tonumber(os.date("%w",os.time()))
                                        -- if today == 1 then --如果是星期一
                                        --         if APP1.isZhuZhan == 2 then
                                        --                 APP1.isZhuZhan = 1
                                        --                 writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","助战1",APP1.isZhuZhan)
                                        --         end
                                        --         if APP2.isZhuZhan == 2 then
                                        --                 APP2.isZhuZhan = 1
                                        --                 writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","助战2",APP2.isZhuZhan)
                                        --         end
                                        --         if APP1.isJiFenDuiHuan == 1 then
                                        --                 APP1.isJiFenDuiHuan = 0
                                        --                 writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","积分兑换1",APP1.isJiFenDuiHuan)
                                        --         end
                                        --         if APP2.isJiFenDuiHuan == 1 then
                                        --                 APP2.isJiFenDuiHuan = 0
                                        --                 writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","积分兑换2",APP2.isJiFenDuiHuan)
                                        --         end
                                        -- end
                                        closeApp(appXiangMu)
                                        numJiaoSe = 0
                                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","角色",numJiaoSe)
                                        huanJiaoSeChongZhi()
                                        timeMaiLan = nowTime
                                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeMaiLan",timeMaiLan)

                                        isWeiXinWeiHu = false
                                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","微信维护",isWeiXinWeiHu)
                                        hourWeiXin = random(10,22)
                                        minWeiXin = random(1,50)
                                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","时",hourWeiXin)
                                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","分",minWeiXin)
                                        
                                        numDay = numDay + 1
                                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","第几天",numDay)
                                        gaiMuBiao(1,mb_YouHua,mm_YouHua)
                                end
                        end
                end
        end
end
--换角色重置
function huanJiaoSeChongZhi( ... )
        timeMaiLan = nowTime
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeMaiLan",timeMaiLan)
        numXunHuan = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numXunHuan",numXunHuan)
        isXueSe = false
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isXueSe",isXueSe)
        isEMo = false
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isEMo",isEMo)
        isDuiWuing = false
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isDuiWuing",isDuiWuing)
        -- isTieXue = false
        -- writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isTieXue",isTieXue)
        isShiLianZhiDi = false
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isShiLianZhiDi",isShiLianZhiDi)
        -- muBiao1 = mb_YouHua
        -- muBiao1Con = mm_YouHua
        -- writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon1,muBiao1Con)
        -- muBiao2 = mb
        -- muBiao2Con = mm_Wu
        -- writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon2,muBiao2Con)
        gaiMuBiao(2,mb_YouHua,mm_YouHua)
        gaiMuBiao(3,mb_HuanJiaoSe,mm_HuanJiaoSe)
        -- muBiao3 = mb_HuanJiaoSe
        -- muBiao3Con = mm_HuanJiaoSe
        -- writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon3,muBiao3Con)
        numDead = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","死亡次数",numDead)
        numXueSe = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","血色次数",numXueSe)
        numEMo = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","恶魔次数",numEMo)
        numTieXue = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","铁血次数",numTieXue)
        numDiaoXian = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","numDiaoXian",numDiaoXian)
        isYouHua = false
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","优化",isYouHua)
        numJinBi = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","金币",numJinBi)
        numFenZuan = 0
        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","粉钻",numFenZuan)
        
        muBiaoZhuanHuan()
end
--每小时掉线一次
function meiXiaoShiDiaoXian( ... )
        if nowTime - timeInitGame >= 60 * 60 then
                timeInitGame = nowTime
                APP1.dengLuCiShu = 0
                APP2.dengLuCiShu = 0
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","账号"..iphoneId.."APP登录次数",0)
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","账号"..iphoneId.."PP登录次数",0)
                APP1.isYongZhe = false
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","勇者之路1",APP1.isYongZhe)
                APP1.isWanShou = false
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","万兽场1",APP1.isWanShou)
                APP2.isYongZhe = false
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","勇者之路2",APP2.isYongZhe)
                APP2.isWanShou = false
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","万兽场2",APP2.isWanShou)
                closeApp(apps1)
                closeApp(apps2)
                mSleep(1000)
                runApp(app1)
                APP = APP1
                mSleep(5000)
                if pingTai2 ~= "10" then
                -- local tmpXuanXiang = string.find(duoXuan1,"1")
                -- if tmpXuanXiang ~= nil then
                        APP = APP2
                        runApp(apps2)
                        mSleep(5000)
                end
        end
    -- if nowDateTime.min == 0 and nowDateTime.sec < 5 then
    --     if not(isColor(109,307,227,164,33,0)) and not(isColor(99,294,126,199,47,0)) then
    --         closeApp(apps1)
    --         mSleep(5000)
    --     end
    -- end   
end 

function getData() --获取数据（62数据）
        local getList = function(path)
                local a = io.popen("ls "..path)
                local f = {};
                for l in a:lines() do
                        table.insert(f,l)
                end
                return f
        end 
        local Wildcard = getList("/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application")
        for var = 1,#Wildcard do
                local file = io.open("/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application/"..Wildcard[var].."/Library/WechatPrivate/wx.dat","rb")
                if file then 
                        local str = file:read("*a")
                        file:close()
                        --[[
                        require"sz"
                        local str = string.tohex(str) --16进制编码
                        ]]
                        return str
                end 
        end 
end


function writeData(data) --写入数据（62数据）
        local getList = function(path)
                local a = io.popen("ls "..path)
                local f = {};
                for l in a:lines() do
                        table.insert(f,l)
                end
                return f
        end 
        local Wildcard = getList("/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application")
        for var = 1,#Wildcard do
                local file = io.open("/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application/"..Wildcard[var].."/Library/WechatPrivate/wx.dat","w+") 
                if file then 
                        file:write(data)
                        file:close()
                        return true  
                end  
        end
end
--识字
-- local tmpYinLiang = shiZi(dictYinLiang,87, 522, 769, 542,0xdcdee1,0x333333,85)
function shiZi( cs_dict,cs_x1,cs_y1,cs_x2,cs_y2,cs_se,cs_pianse,cs_sim )
        if version == "2.2.4" then   
                by.UseDict(cs_dict)
                local tmpRet = by.Ocr(cs_x1,cs_y1,cs_x2,cs_y2,cs_se,cs_pianse,cs_sim/100)
                return tmpRet
        else
                local tmpRet = dmOcrText(cs_dict,cs_x1,cs_y1,cs_x2,cs_y2,string.format("%x",cs_se)..","..string.format("%x",cs_pianse),cs_sim)
                return tmpRet
        end        
end
--找字
-- x, y = zhaoZi(dictBeiBao,925,489,1035,518,0x7d3b18,0x333333,85,"zc")
function zhaoZi( cs_dict,cs_x1,cs_y1,cs_x2,cs_y2,cs_se,cs_pianse,cs_sim,cs_zi )
        if version == "2.2.4" then
                by.UseDict(cs_dict)
                local tmpx,tmpy = by.FindStr(cs_x1,cs_y1,cs_x2,cs_y2,cs_zi,cs_se,cs_pianse,cs_sim/100)                
                return tmpx,tmpy
        else
                return dmFindText(cs_dict,cs_zi,cs_x1,cs_y1,cs_x2,cs_y2,string.format("%x",cs_se)..","..string.format("%x",cs_pianse),cs_sim)
        end
end

-- 初次加载斗鱼
function chuCiJiaZaiDouYu( ... )
        if string.find(duoXuan1,"9") ~= nil then
                require("douYu")
        end
end
-- 加截斗鱼
function jiaZaiDouYu( ... )
        if string.find(duoXuan1,"9") ~= nil then
                douYu()
        end
end









-----------------------私有部分--------------------------
function zongHe( ... ) 
        if fuBenNei() then
                if isColor(25,196,252,238,196,5) and isColor(29,203,200,110,49,5) then
                        tiaoShi("副本通关--退出")
                        touchClick(975,34,55,64,69)
                end
                if isColor(97,246,255,250,223,5) and isColor(185,287,238,185,110,5) then
                        tiaoShi("万魔塔--通关--或许退出")
                        mSleep(10000)
                        if isColor(97,246,255,250,223,5) then
                                touchClick(975,34,55,64,69)
                        end
                end
                if isColor(146,150,233,221,198,5) and isColor(198,162,207,197,180,5) and not(isColor(830,594,123,62,19)) then
                        tiaoShi("血色城堡--没自动")
                        touchClick(153,239,42,46,46)
                end
                if isColor(136,145,179,172,165,5) and isColor(192,158,151,143,131,5) and not(isColor(830,594,123,62,19)) then
                        tiaoShi("铁血路径--没自动")
                        touchClick(106,298,72,89,119)
                end
                if isColor(129,148,184,175,168,5) and isColor(185,160,152,146,142,5) and not(isColor(830,594,123,62,19)) then
                        tiaoShi("恶魔广场--没自动")
                        touchClick(153,239,42,46,46)
                end
        end
        if isColor(705,198,164,86,33,5) and isColor(692,344,127,224,198,5) and isColor(920,132,223,191,118,5) and isColor(920,141,255,239,206,5) then
                tiaoShi("霸主神姿")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) and isColor(920,133,223,190,114,5) and isColor(549,303,173,174,194,5) then
                tiaoShi("霜神圣武")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) and isColor(920,133,223,190,114,5) and isColor(644,193,100,97,107,5) then
                tiaoShi("天极神炎")
                touchClick(921,141)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) and isColor(920,133,223,190,114,5) and isColor(773,345,185,164,179,5) then
                tiaoShi("深渊凝光")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) and isColor(920,132,225,193,118,5) and isColor(250,185,248,171,86,5) then
                tiaoShi("部分机型闪退")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(530,409,170,125,67,5) and isColor(608,432,174,106,52,5) and isColor(289,235,216,208,183,5) then
                tiaoShi("掉线了")
                touchClick(530,409)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) and isColor(920,133,223,190,114,5) and isColor(330,173,48,180,231,5) then
                tiaoShi("三周年")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(921,150,192,148,77,5) and isColor(920,142,255,239,205,5) and isColor(473,213,247,212,212,5) then
                tiaoShi("2周年倒计时")
                touchClick(920,142)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) and isColor(920,131,228,197,121,5) and isColor(336,183,214,220,234,5) then
                tiaoShi("全面升级以下活动")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) and isColor(920,132,225,193,118,5) and isColor(469,152,212,189,134,5) then
                tiaoShi("星河旋转new")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,206,5) and isColor(920,133,225,192,115,5) and isColor(469,153,240,207,142,5) then
                tiaoShi("星河旋转")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(299,375,188,63,46,5) and isColor(920,141,255,239,206,5) and isColor(920,132,226,194,120,5) then
                tiaoShi("6666幸运大奖")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(201,160,255,232,104,5) and isColor(226,172,57,36,8,5) then
                tiaoShi("关闭位面活动")
                touchClick(34,20)
                isHongDian = true
                timeHuoDong = nowTime
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","timeHuoDong",timeHuoDong)
        end
        if isColor(415,173,67,159,196,5) and isColor(920,141,255,239,206,5) and isColor(920,152,192,145,75,5) then
        	tiaoShi("创圣极光")
        	touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(920,141,255,239,206,5) and isColor(911,141,213,177,105,5) and isColor(724,252,48,79,96,5) and isColor(723,235,36,255,255,5) then

        or (isColor(265,598,74,65,73,5) and isColor(1050,605,169,129,70,5))
        then
                tiaoShi("粉钻商城")
                if muBiao == mb_ChiBang then
                        if yuMaoOrHuoZhong == "yuMao" then
                                touchClick(973,199,23,66,117)--羽毛
                                mSleep(2000)
                                if isColor(615,475,33,49,52) then--可买
                                        for i=1,5 do
                                                touchQuickly(663,483,36,49,58) -- +
                                        end
                                        touchClick(602,560,110,90,61)--购买
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                        if isColor(486,263,254,248,239) then--没钻了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                        end
                                        if isColor(615,475,33,49,52) then--背包满了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                closeForever()
                                                gaiMuBiao(3,mb_ZhengLi,mm_ZhengLi)
                                                return
                                        end
                                elseif isColor(615,433,36,49,58) then--可买-旧
                                        for i=1,5 do
                                                touchQuickly(663,483,36,49,58) -- +
                                        end
                                        touchClick(602,560,110,90,61)--购买
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                        if isColor(486,263,254,248,239) then--没钻了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                        end
                                        if isColor(615,433,36,49,58) then--背包满了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                closeForever()
                                                gaiMuBiao(3,mb_ZhengLi,mm_ZhengLi)
                                                return
                                        end
                                end
                        elseif yuMaoOrHuoZhong == "huoZhong" then
                                touchClick(758,197,154,50,19) --火种
                                mSleep(2000)
                                if isColor(615,475,33,49,52) then--可买
                                        for i=1,5 do
                                                touchQuickly(663,483,36,49,58) -- +
                                        end
                                        touchClick(602,560,110,90,61)--购买
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                        if isColor(486,263,254,248,239) then--没钻了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                        end
                                        if isColor(615,475,33,49,52) then--背包满了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                closeForever()
                                                gaiMuBiao(3,mb_ZhengLi,mm_ZhengLi)
                                                return
                                        end
                                elseif isColor(615,433,36,49,58) then--可买-旧
                                        touchClick(663,483,36,49,58) -- +
                                        touchClick(602,560,110,90,61)--购买
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                        if isColor(486,263,254,248,239) then--没钻了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                        end
                                        if isColor(615,433,36,49,58) then--背包满了
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                touchClick(31,20)
                                                closeForever()
                                                gaiMuBiao(3,mb_ZhengLi,mm_ZhengLi)
                                                return
                                        end
                                end
                        end
                        closeForever()
                        muBiao3 = mb_Wu
                        muBiao3Con = mm_Wu
                        writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon3,muBiao3Con)
                        muBiaoZhuanHuan()
                else
                        closeForever()
                end
        end
        if isColor(310,524,163,114,53,5) and isColor(441,523,165,115,56,5) and isColor(977,514,216,218,224,5) then
                tiaoShi("设置界面")
                if muBiao == mb_HuanJiaoSe or muBiao == mb_JY_HuanJiaoSe then
                        tiaoShi("选择角色")
                        touchClick(310,524,163,113,60)
                elseif muBiao == mb_YouHua then
                        tiaoShi("优化设置")
                        if isColor(632,161,28,35,49,9) then
                                touchClick(632,161,28,35,49)--低画质
                        end
                        if isColor(202,288,28,35,49) then
                                touchClick(202,288,28,35,49)--关闭音乐
                        end
                        if isColor(418,291,28,35,49) then
                                touchClick(418,291,28,35,49)--关闭音效
                        end
                        if isColor(334,214,73,204,254) then
                                touchClick(334,214,73,204,254)--玩家人数
                        end
                        touchClick(62,235,72,86,107)--挂机设置
                        mSleep(1000)
                        if isColor(203,398,12,116,186) then
                                touchClick(203,398,12,116,186)--药品
                        elseif isColor(203,398,12,114,177) then
                                touchClick(203,398,12,116,186)--药品
                        end
                        touchClick(1026,60)
                        if muBiao1 == mb_YouHua then
                                gaiMuBiao(1,mb_ZhuXian,mm_ZhuXian)
                        elseif muBiao2 == mb_YouHua then
                                gaiMuBiao(2,mb_Wu,mm_Wu)
                        end
                else
                        touchClick(1026,60,255,239,205)
                end
        end
        if isColor(310,524,163,113,60,5) and isColor(441,523,164,116,61,5) and isColor(977,514,216,218,222,5) then
                tiaoShi("设置界面-旧")
                if muBiao == mb_HuanJiaoSe or muBiao == mb_JY_HuanJiaoSe then
                        tiaoShi("选择角色")
                        touchClick(310,524,163,113,60)
                elseif muBiao == mb_YouHua then
                        tiaoShi("优化设置")
                        if isColor(632,161,28,35,49,9) then
                                touchClick(632,161,28,35,49)--低画质
                        end
                        if isColor(202,288,28,35,49) then
                                touchClick(202,288,28,35,49)--关闭音乐
                        end
                        if isColor(418,291,28,35,49) then
                                touchClick(418,291,28,35,49)--关闭音效
                        end
                        if isColor(334,214,73,204,254) then
                                touchClick(334,214,73,204,254)--玩家人数
                        end
                        touchClick(62,235,72,86,107)--挂机设置
                        mSleep(1000)
                        if isColor(203,398,12,116,186) then
                                touchClick(203,398,12,116,186)--药品
                        elseif isColor(203,398,12,114,177) then
                                touchClick(203,398,12,116,186)--药品
                        end
                        touchClick(1026,60)
                        if muBiao1 == mb_YouHua then
                                gaiMuBiao(1,mb_ZhuXian,mm_ZhuXian)
                        elseif muBiao2 == mb_YouHua then
                                gaiMuBiao(2,mb_Wu,mm_Wu)
                        end
                else
                        touchClick(1026,60,255,239,205)
                end
        end

        if isColor(186,123,133,130,114,5) and isColor(946,532,133,130,114,5) and isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) then
                tiaoShi("广告")
                touchClick(920,141)
        end
        if isColor(917,194,185,100,221,5) and isColor(870,323,210,76,77,5) and isColor(119,356,9,123,255,5) and isColor(52,384,224,106,6,5) and isColor(920,141,255,239,205,5) then
                tiaoShi("公众号")
                touchClick(920,141,255,239,205)
        end
        if isColor(578,170,186,182,176,5) and isColor(852,484,194,189,183,5) and isColor(273,239,89,105,138,5) and isColor(554,483,72,79,105,5) then
                tiaoShi("获取途径")
                touchClick(31,20)
        end
        if isColor(414,393,96,125,168,5) and isColor(644,413,175,109,55,5) and isColor(643,392,191,178,160,5) and isColor(723,406,169,162,137,5) then
                tiaoShi("退队并进入")
                touchClick(644,413,175,109,55)

                touchClick(998,105,255,239,205)
        end
        if isColor(419,395,105,114,131,5) and isColor(649,397,165,120,64,5) and isColor(423,272,209,152,26,5) then
                tiaoShi("失落之塔")
                touchClick(419,395,105,114,131)

        if isColor(422,398,104,108,125,5) and isColor(653,399,164,119,62,5) and isColor(468,273,206,148,26,5) then

                touchClick(419,395,105,114,131)

                        touchClick(1018,453,255,86,52)
                end

                --         touchClick(949,269)
                --         closeForever()

                if isColor(944,364,169,120,63) then
                        touchClick(944,364,169,120,63)
                        touchClick(31,20)
                elseif isColor(946,269,169,117,60,5) then
                        touchClick(946,269,169,117,60,5)
                        touchClick(31,20)
                elseif isColor(949,168,164,117,61) then
                        touchClick(949,168,164,117,61)
                        touchClick(31,20)
                else
                        touchClick(31,20)
                end
        end
        if isColor(627,162,75,203,211,5) and isColor(657,165,109,241,249,5) and isColor(632,202,17,124,81,5) and isColor(517,457,187,154,104,5) then
                tiaoShi("2倍经验卡")
                touchClick(31,20)--关闭
        end
        if isColor(557,300,245,234,191,5) and isColor(557,313,193,181,131,5) and isColor(559,307,122,116,117,5) then
                tiaoShi("聊天框")
                -- if not(isColor(15,104,160,133,108)) and not(isColor(15,104,160,124,88)) then
                --         touchClick(15,104,160,133,108)--主动返回世界频道
                -- end
                if muBiao == mb_MaiShu then--卖书
                        if not(isColor(15,104,160,133,108)) and not(isColor(15,104,160,124,88)) then
                                touchClick(15,104,160,133,108)--主动返回世界频道
                        end
                        if isColor(422,602,165,117,62) then--有发送二字
                                x,y = findColorInRegionFuzzy( 0xb6b0ab, 90, 515,23,515,557)
                                if x > 0 then
                                        touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框 
                                        return
                                else
                                        touchClick(178,599,49,53,71)--输入框
                                        mSleep(2000)
                                        if danXuan4 == "1" then
                                                inputText(hanHuaNeiRong1)
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                                touchClick(1025,597,155,166,180)--return
                                                mSleep(1000)                                                                
                                                touchClick(363,601,186,189,198)-- +
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                                touchClick(198,514,186,189,198)--坐标
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                                touchClick(429,601,165,120,63)--发送
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                                -- gaiMuBiao(3,mb_DengDaiJiaoYi,mm_DengDaiJiaoYi)
                                                touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框 
                                        elseif danXuan4 == "2" then
                                                inputText(hanHuaNeiRong2)
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                                touchClick(1025,597,155,166,180)--return
                                                mSleep(1000)                                                                
                                                touchClick(363,601,186,189,198)-- +
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                                touchClick(198,514,186,189,198)--坐标
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                                touchClick(429,601,165,120,63)--发送
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                                -- gaiMuBiao(3,mb_DengDaiJiaoYi,mm_DengDaiJiaoYi)
                                                touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框 
                                        elseif danXuan4 == "3" then
                                                inputText(hanHuaNeiRong3)
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                                touchClick(1025,597,155,166,180)--return
                                                mSleep(1000) 
                                                touchClick(429,601,165,120,63)--发送
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                                -- gaiMuBiao(3,mb_DengDaiJiaoYi,mm_DengDaiJiaoYi)
                                                touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框 
                                        end
                                end
                        end
                elseif muBiao == mb_DengDaiSiXin then--等待私信
                        if isColor(76,325,255,88,54,5) and isColor(17,338,103,112,137,5) then--左边栏有私信1
                                touchClick(17,338,103,112,137)
                                mSleep(1000)
                        elseif isColor(76,367,255,92,58) and not(isColor(14,378,155,128,103)) then--左边栏有私信2
                                touchClick(44,374,104,113,141)
                                mSleep(1000)
                        else
                                for i=1,10 do
                                        x,y = findColorInRegionFuzzy( 0xff5d3a, 80, 319,34,319,544)
                                        if x > 0 then
                                                break
                                        else
                                                touchMoveXY(282,542,282,75)
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                        end
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                end
                                
                                for i=1,120 do
                                        nowDateTime = os.date("*t") 
                                        if nowDateTime.sec > 10 and nowDateTime.sec < 40 then
                                                
                                                break
                                        end
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                end 
                                if x > 0 then
                                        touchClick(218,y)
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                -- if isColor(189,103,221,221,227,5) and isColor(223,113,237,237,238,5) then
                                        -- tiaoShi("内容为hello")
                                        if isColor(422,602,165,117,62) then--有发送二字
                                                touchClick(363,601,186,189,198)-- +
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                                touchClick(198,514,186,189,198)--坐标
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                                touchClick(429,601,165,120,63)--发送
                                                mSleep(2000)
                                                -- if isColor(430,189,168,142,117) then--已发出消息在第2行
                                                --         gaiMuBiao(3,mb_DengDaiJiaoYi,mm_DengDaiJiaoYi)
                                                --         touchClick(44,97,113,121,146)--世界
                                                --         touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框
                                                -- elseif isColor(430,313,170,142,116) then--已发出消息在第3行
                                                --         gaiMuBiao(3,mb_DengDaiJiaoYi,mm_DengDaiJiaoYi)
                                                --         touchClick(44,97,113,121,146)--世界
                                                --         touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框
                                                -- end
                                                gaiMuBiao(3,mb_DengDaiJiaoYi,mm_DengDaiJiaoYi)
                                                touchClick(44,97,113,121,146)--世界
                                                touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框
                                        end
                                else
                                        touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框
                                end
                        end
                -- elseif muBiao == mb_DengDaiHuiFu then--等待回复
                --         if isColor(76,367,255,92,58) and not(isColor(14,378,155,128,103)) then--左边栏有私信

                --         elseif isColor(76,324,255,94,60) and not(isColor(15,335,157,130,104)) then--左边栏有私信2

                --                 mSleep(1000)
                --         elseif isColor(318,72,255,81,47) then--第一条私信
                --                 touchClick(318,72,255,81,47)
                --                 mSleep(1000)
                --         elseif isColor(181,224,132,134,154) then--得到回复

                --                 touchQuickly(222,209,148,216,137)
                --                 touchQuickly(241,210,152,230,135)
                --                 touchQuickly(256,209,146,212,135)
                --                 touchQuickly(273,208,150,230,133)
                --                 -- touchClick(225,209,153,237,134)--点击传送

                --                 gaiMuBiao(3,mb_QianWangJiaoYi,mm_QianWangJiaoYi)

                --                         touchClick(42,98,106,113,137)--返回世界
                --                         touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框
                --                 end 
                --                 -- if isColor(551,306,253,250,238) then--传送失败
                --                 --         touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框
                --                 -- else
                --                 --         gaiMuBiao(3,mb_QianWangJiaoYi,mm_QianWangJiaoYi)
                --                 -- end
                --         else
                --                 touchClick(552,307,216,209,176)--关闭聊天框
                --         end
                elseif muBiao == mb_QianWangJiaoYi then--前往交易
                        if not(isColor(15,104,160,133,108)) and not(isColor(15,104,160,124,88)) then
                                touchClick(15,104,160,133,108)--主动返回世界频道
                        end
                        if isColor(38,402,190,199,211) or isColor(43,402,151,161,177) then--私聊下面有...
                                touchClick(44,334,102,111,13)--私聊
                        else--私聊下面没有...
                                touchClick(42,376,102,112,139)--私聊
                        end
                        mSleep(1000)
                        if isColor(134,52,174,172,172) or isColor(134,52,151,152,161) or isColor(134,52,160,160,167) then--有聊天记录
                                touchClick(264,92,57,60,78)--打开第一条记录
                                mSleep(1000)
                                x,y = findColorInRegionFuzzy( 0x838599, 80, 178,90,178,549)
                                if x > 0 then--对方回复了
                                        touchQuickly(206,y,138,204,126)
                                        touchQuickly(222,y,148,216,137)
                                        touchQuickly(241,y,152,230,135)
                                        touchQuickly(256,y,146,212,135)
                                        touchQuickly(273,y,150,230,133)--点击传送
                                        touchClick(129,y-6,123,106,98)--对方头像
                                        mSleep(1000)
                                        x1,y1 = findMultiColorInRegionFuzzy( 0xbab6b1, "5|0|0xaeaaa6,0|-6|0xbeb9b3", 80, 136, 353, 147, 595)
                                        x,y = findMultiColorInRegionFuzzy( 0xc2bdb7, "5|0|0xbcb8b2,0|-7|0xc2bdb7", 80, 136, 353, 142, 595)
                                        if x > 0 then
                                                tiaoShi("x>0")
                                                touchClick(x+48,y-119)--请求交易
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                        elseif x1 > 0 then
                                                tiaoShi("x1>0")
                                                touchClick(x1+48,y1-119)--请求交易
                                                mSleep(1000)
                                        else
                                                tiaoShi("请求失败")
                                                touchClick(40,392,161,131,101)--请求失败
                                        end
                                -- elseif isColor(180,124,132,134,154) then--对方回复在第1条
                                --         touchQuickly(206,108,138,204,126)
                                --         touchQuickly(222,108,148,216,137)
                                --         touchQuickly(241,108,152,230,135)
                                --         touchQuickly(256,108,146,212,135)
                                --         touchQuickly(273,108,150,230,133)
                                --         -- touchClick(225,209,153,237,134)--点击传送

                                --         mSleep(1000)
                                --         if isColor(143,329,71,78,104) then--有交易选项
                                --                 touchClick(185,247,72,78,104)--请求交易

                                --                         touchClick(40,392,161,131,101)
                                --                 end
                                --         end

                                else
                                        toast("对方没有回复")
                                        -- xiaoHaoHuanJiaoSe()
                                end
                        else
                                toast("没有聊天记录")
                                xiaoHaoHuanJiaoSe()
                        end
                else
                        touchClick(557,300)
                end
        end
        if isColor(31,20,197,196,196,5) and isColor(19,135,255,255,255,5) and isColor(1045,136,180,125,71,5) and isColor(1074,138,255,255,255,5) then
                tiaoShi("误开地图")
                touchClick(31,20)
        end
        if isColor(31,20,197,196,196,5) and isColor(19,231,255,255,255,5) and isColor(160,360,255,253,245,5) then
                tiaoShi("误开世界地图")
                touchClick(31,20)
        end
        if isColor(584,516,91,129,178,5) and isColor(715,517,95,124,167,5) and isColor(857,520,169,124,66,5) and isColor(989,107,255,239,205,5) and isColor(557,81,101,114,127,5) and isColor(588,96,151,156,160,5) then
                tiaoShi("组队界面")
                touchClick(989,107,255,239,205)--关闭
        end
        if isColor(702,514,102,131,172,5) and isColor(855,517,165,122,67,5) and isColor(1048,116,255,239,205,5) and isColor(90,213,177,61,20,5) then
                tiaoShi("我的队伍")
                touchClick(1048,116,255,239,205)--关闭
                if muBiao2 == mb_EMo then
                        isDuiWuing = true
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isDuiWuing",isDuiWuing)
                end
        end
        if isColor(702,514,170,126,68,5) and isColor(855,517,166,122,67,5) and isColor(1048,116,255,239,205,5) and isColor(90,213,176,61,20,5) then
                tiaoShi("我的队伍--离开队伍")
                touchClick(607,519,100,113,132)--离开队伍
                touchClick(649,396,164,120,65)--确定
                touchClick(1048,116,255,239,205)--关闭
                if muBiao2 == mb_EMo then
                        isDuiWuing = true
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isDuiWuing",isDuiWuing)
                end
        end
        if isColor(704,517,110,118,135,5) and isColor(854,521,160,115,61,5) and isColor(89,205,179,61,19,5) then
                tiaoShi("我的队伍--离开队伍")
                touchClick(754,521,232,231,205)--离开队伍
                touchClick(649,396,164,120,65)--确定
                touchClick(1048,116,255,239,205)--关闭
                if muBiao2 == mb_EMo then
                        isDuiWuing = true
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isDuiWuing",isDuiWuing)
                end
        end

        if isColor(5,282,61,26,24,5) and isColor(28,324,212,97,35,5) then
                numDiTu = tonumber(diTu)
                if numDiTu <= 14 then
                        tiaoShi("队伍->任务")
                        touchClick(6,167,78,87,104)
                end                
        end
        -- if isColor(11,284,135,85,77) and isColor(22,334,123,33,12,5) then
        --         tiaoShi("队伍--有队")
        --         if zhuJieMian() then
        --                 tiaoShi("主界面--无条件离队")
        --                 isDuiWuing = true
        --                 liDui()
        --         else
        --                 tiaoShi("副本内--队伍->任务")
        --                 touchClick(6,167,78,87,104)
        --         end
        -- end
        if isColor(11,285,192,193,199,5) and isColor(25,337,77,78,94,5) and zhuJieMian() then
                tiaoShi("任务--有队")
                tiaoShi("主界面--无条件离队")
                isDuiWuing = true
                liDui()                
        end
        if (isColor(240,425,67,73,92,5) and isColor(266,427,156,173,206,5) and isColor(947,107,255,239,206,5) and isColor(570,570,37,186,209,5))
        or (isColor(240,425,67,73,93,5) and isColor(266,427,155,171,204,5) and isColor(947,107,255,239,205,5) and isColor(570,570,35,179,204,5))
        or (isColor(240,425,67,73,92,5) and isColor(266,427,156,171,205,5) and isColor(947,107,255,239,205,5) and isColor(570,570,29,189,216,5))
        then
                tiaoShi("提升界面")
                touchClick(947,107,255,239,205)
        end 
        if isColor(525,389,169,128,71,5) and isColor(606,408,169,111,57,5) and isColor(848,235,165,153,129,5) and isColor(568,504,174,115,56,5) then
                tiaoShi("与服务器断开连接")
                touchClick(525,389,169,128,71)
        end
        if isColor(525,389,169,127,70,5) and isColor(606,408,169,111,56,5) and isColor(848,235,165,153,128,5) and isColor(533,512,88,67,41,5) then
                tiaoShi("提示--确定--唯一--用户名已经在线")
                touchClick(525,389,169,127,70)
        end
        if isColor(525,389,169,127,70,5) and isColor(606,408,169,111,56,5) and isColor(848,235,255,239,205,5) then
                tiaoShi("提示--确定--唯一")
                touchClick(565,396,204,200,187)
        end
        if isColor(515,560,168,126,71,5) and isColor(622,584,172,107,55,5) then
                tiaoShi("确定--唯一")
                touchClick(565,573,230,224,207)
        end
        if not(isColor(832,598,165,120,65,5)) and isColor(997,599,91,118,163,5) and isColor(1088,608,107,106,138,5) then
                tiaoShi("战斗胜利或失败--铁血--次数用完了")
                numTieXue = 2
                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","铁血次数",numTieXue)
                touchClick(997,600,91,115,160)--退出活动
                -- isTieXue = false
                -- writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isTieXue",isTieXue)
                muBiao2 = mb_Wu
                muBiao2Con = mm_Wu
                writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon2,muBiao2Con)
                muBiaoZhuanHuan() 
                mSleep(5000)
        end
        if isColor(832,598,165,120,65,5) and isColor(997,599,91,118,163,5) and isColor(1088,608,107,106,138) then
                tiaoShi("战斗胜利或失败--铁血")
                if muBiao2 == mb_TieXue then
                        numTieXue = numTieXue + 1
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","铁血次数",numTieXue)
                        if isColor(512,604,244,222,63) then--还有奖励呢
                                touchClick(827,600,167,119,63)--再来一局
                        else
                                numTieXue = 2
                                writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","铁血次数",numTieXue)
                                touchClick(997,600,91,115,160)--退出活动
                                -- isTieXue = false
                                -- writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isTieXue",isTieXue)
                                muBiao2 = mb_Wu
                                muBiao2Con = mm_Wu
                                writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon2,muBiao2Con)
                                muBiaoZhuanHuan()  
                        end
                        mSleep(5000)
                end
        end
        if isColor(857,583,165,123,68,5) and isColor(995,606,173,108,54,5) and isColor(872,595,11,239,255,5) then
                tiaoShi("战斗结束--血色或者恶魔")
                touchClick(912,584,162,121,66)
                mSleep(5000)
                if muBiao2 == mb_XueSe then                        
                        touchClick(973,35,150,148,137)--离开
                        numXueSe = numXueSe + 1
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","血色次数",numXueSe)
                        isXueSe = false
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isXueSe",isXueSe)
                        muBiao2 = mb_Wu
                        muBiao2Con = mm_Wu
                        writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon2,muBiao2Con)
                        muBiaoZhuanHuan()  
                elseif muBiao2 == mb_EMo then                        
                        touchClick(973,35,150,148,137)--离开
                        numEMo = numEMo + 1
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","恶魔次数",numEMo)
                        isEMo = false
                        writePlist(luaMuLu..xiangMu..".plist","isEMo",isEMo)
                        muBiao2 = mb_Wu
                        muBiao2Con = mm_Wu
                        writeConfig(State["Bid"].."_Set.dat",mbCon2,muBiao2Con)
                        muBiaoZhuanHuan()                        
                end
        end

        or (isColor(521,537,164,122,67,5) and isColor(618,556,170,112,56,5) and isColor(814,196,185,106,159,5) and isColor(669,294,183,119,164,5)) then

                tiaoShi("翅膀升阶成功")
                touchClick(558,598,7,8,13)--空白

                tiaoShi("误开转职")
                closeForever()
        end
        if isColor(392,390,167,124,68,5) and isColor(488,410,174,111,57,5) and isColor(644,388,171,128,70,5) and isColor(747,411,172,107,55,5) and isColor(734,408,81,69,54,5) then

                touchClick(696,396,148,121,82)
                timeDingShiDianRenWu = nowTime - 60 * 60
        end

                tiaoShi("断线重连2")
                touchClick(696,396,148,121,82)
                timeDingShiDianRenWu = nowTime - 60 * 60
        end

        or (isColor(607,77,165,122,69,5) and isColor(621,86,235,236,226,5) and isColor(633,75,166,126,67,5)) then
